text: Alloh harom kardaast ʙar sumo moli xudmurdavu xun va gusti xuk va har ciro, ki dar vaqti zaʙh ʙo nomi ƣajri Alloh zaʙh kunand. Ammo kase, ki nocor savad, ʙa xotiri hifzi con az cizi harom ʙixurad, dar hole ki sitamgor naʙosad va az had tacovuz nakunad, pas Alloh taolo omurzandavu mehruʙon ast
